channel.title: intro on Suraj Deshmukh
channel.description: Recent content in intro on Suraj Deshmukh

item.title: First post
item.description: This is the new home for my blog. I use to write on wordpress before. You can find the older blog at https://deshmukhsuraj.wordpress.com. But I wanted to have my own domain and wordpress was charging exorbitantly to connect a custom domain to wordpress, so I just ditched it and started writing here. This is much more convenient.
